code: import React from"react";import Header from"../../components/header/Header";import Footer from"../../components/footer/Footer";import ExperienceAccordion from"../../containers/experienceAccordion/ExperienceAccordion.js";import"./Experience.css";import{experience}from"../../portfolio.js";import{Fade}from"react-reveal";import ExperienceImg from"./ExperienceImg";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Experience(props){var theme=props.theme;console.log(props.setTheme);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"experience-main",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{theme:theme,setTheme:props.setTheme}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"basic-experience",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Fade,{bottom:true,duration:2000,distance:"40px",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"experience-heading-div",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"experience-heading-img-div",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ExperienceImg,{theme:theme})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"experience-heading-text-div",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"experience-heading-text",style:{color:theme.text},children:experience.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"experience-heading-sub-text",style:{color:theme.text},children:experience["subtitle"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"experience-header-detail-text subTitle",style:{color:theme.secondaryText},children:experience["description"]})]})]})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ExperienceAccordion,{sections:experience["sections"],theme:theme}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{theme:props.theme,onToggle:props.onToggle})]});}export default Experience;
